page.title: 03 BIRD HILL FARM.
page.content: One hundred and fifty -nine years ago Bird Hill Farm was being built. Hill Farm is now derelict but Bird Hill Farm still remains.The farm covers three hundred and eighty acres and in that space the main produce is grain,wheat,barley,sugar,potatoes and peas. Mr Barker, the owner of the farm has been in the farming business for thirty years, twenty-five years of this time he has spent working on farms in Heighington. He now owns twenty five bullocks,two dogs and some poultry. He employs three people full time and two people part time. He owns five tractors, one combine harvestor and a sugarbeet harvestor. The farm is at the end of a country lane,it stands on its own apart from his house which is next to it.
